int  id,
const char *  path

path = "/dir/subdir/subsubdir"
path := similar to a unix directory path

int  id,

int pvMovieControl ( PARAM *  p,
int  id,
int  step 
) 
step == -2 restart
step == -1 unpause
step == 0  pause
step >  0  step step steps
Allowed widgets QLabel
